string.value: #b#p2101011##k in #b#m260000200##k seems to be in some kind of trouble... Go pay him visit.

#b#p2101011##k says he didn't retrieve his arrows for a week and now he can't find them all. You tell #b#p2101011##k you would find his missing arrows, but wow, he's really missing a lot! Goodness. How many arrows does #b#p2101011##k shoot everyday? \n You might've heard somewhere that they sell #b#t02060001##k in either #r#m220000000##k or #r#m222000000##k...

#b#p2101011##k started practicing with his bow again, now that you've given him the arrows. You wanted to ask #b#p2101011##k how many arrows he shoots each day, but he looked so focused that you felt bad bothering him.

Hm? Are you one of us? Wait, it doesn't even matter...just find me my arrows. I usually collect them right after I shoot them, but a few days ago, I wasn't feeling well so I didn't. This morning, I finally got out of bed and looked all over town for my arrows, but couldn't find them all. Now I'm missing some. Can you help me find them?

I only use #b#t02060001##k. A true skillsman only uses the one type of arrow that fit them perfectly. Right now, I am missing #b10000#k arrows. Think that's a lot? In order to rescue Ariant from the queen, that's nothing. I use way more than that in a single day.
Bring them to me once you find them all. You're my only hope.
People who constantly change their mind can't be trusted. I'll be keeping an eye on you from now on.

Great. Now I can continue to fight for Ariant. I will never forget what you've done for me. But, you didn't just buy any old arrows at a store, right? I make my own, so I can tell if you're trying to fool me... If you're trying to trick me, you will regret it.
Mmm... These are it. All #b10000#k of them. Thank you.
Did you find all the arrows? Search carefully near town as well...
